Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation: set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.name=..Name.Value if (shortInfo = 1) quit proxy set proxy.dateBegin=$ZDATE(..DateBegin, 3) set proxy.dateEnd=$ZDATE(..DateEnd, 3) set proxy.maxPeople=..MaxPeople set proxy.numberOfStudent=..NumberOfStudent set proxy.isInUse=..IsInUse if (..Curator){ set proxy.curator=..Curator.ConvertToProxyObject() } set proxy.city=..City.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.street=..Street set proxy.room=..Room set proxy.freeSeats=..MaxPeople-..NumberOfStudent set proxy.company=..Company.ConvertToProxyObject() quit proxy

Method.name: GetNumberOfStudent
Method.Implementation:
set count = 0
&sql(SELECT COUNT(FirstName) As TotalCount INTO :count FROM Sti_Data.Intern WHERE Internship = :internshipId)
quit count

Method.name: CheckDeletePrivilege
Method.Implementation:
SET SQLCODE="" &sql(%CHECKPRIV DELETE ON Sti_Data.Internship) if (SQLCODE = 100) || ($UserName = "UnknownUser") quit ##class(Sti.Utils.Msg).GetErrorStatus("error_NoPrivilegeForDelete", " USERNAME="_$USERNAME)
quit $$$OK
